title: CPCS Transcom
author: ''
date: '2022-09-15'
slug: cpcs_transcom
categories: []
tags: []
images:
  - /img/cover.png
r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $878.9K
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with CPCS Transcom. The average
  contract duration was 0.44 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $145.4K. The longest
  contract was 3.37 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $1.5M.
lookup_name: 'CPCS TRANSCOM'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '878.9K'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '52'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '5'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '10%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '17%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '1.4'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '655.1K'
s424_mean_duration: '0.44'
s421_mean_contract_value: '145.4K'
s425_max_duration: '3.37'
s422_max_contract_value: '1.5M'
---
